pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Proportional Hazards Model with Sparse Longitudinal Covariates // Provides kernel weighting methods for estimation of proportional hazards models with intermittently observed longitudinal covariates. Cao H., Churpek M. M., Zeng D., and Fine J. P. (2015) doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.957289.
